Header.title: Best activity tracker out there!
Header.paragraph: Our app tracks key presses, clipboard, screens and much more.

About.paragraph: Our KeyLogger app is designed to ensure comprehensive monitoring and security of user activity on devices. It combines powerful tracking capabilities with robust encryption to keep your data secure. Hereâ€™s a detailed overview of the features and services our app offers:

Features.title: Key Press Tracking
Features.text: Captures every key press made on the device, including special keys and key combinations.

Features.title: Screenshot Capture
Features.text: Periodically captures screenshots of the active window or entire screen to provide visual context to key logs.

Features.title: Clipboard Monitoring
Features.text: Logs all text copied to the clipboard, ensuring that even temporarily stored data is captured.

Features.title: Data Encryption
Features.text: Ensures that all captured data, including keystrokes, screenshots, and clipboard contents, are encrypted using strong encryption algorithms.
